title: Junior Executive Human Resources
jd: Bachelor's degree or professional qualification in Human Resources.
Minimum of two years of relevant work experience.
Proficiency in MS Office applications and Human Resource Information Systems (HRIS).
Excellent communication skills in both English and Sinhala.
Strong attention to detail and ability to maintain accuracy in HR documentation and records.
Demonstrated ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and support HR initiatives effectively

title: Intern - Marketing
jd: Currently enrolled in a Bachelor's degree program in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field.
Strong passion for marketing and eagerness to learn about various marketing strategies and tactics.
Familiarity with social media platforms and digital marketing concepts is a plus.
Ability to work well in a fast-paced environment and collaborate effectively with team members.
Proactive attitude with a willingness to take on new challenges and contribute fresh ideas to marketing campaigns.
Availability to work 40 hours per week for a six-month internship period.

title: Intern - Design
jd: Currently enrolled in a Bachelor's degree program in Fashion Design, Textile Design, Graphic Design, or related field.
Strong passion for design, particularly in the field of fashion.
Proficiency in design software such as Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, and/or other relevant design tools.
Ability to conceptualize and create innovative designs for clothing, accessories, or related fashion items.
Strong sketching and illustration skills..
Availability to work 40 hours per week for a six-month internship period.

title: Visual Merchandising
jd: Currently enrolled in a Bachelor's degree program in Visual Merchandising, Retail Management, Fashion Design, Marketing, Business, or related field.
Strong interest in visual merchandising and a passion for creating visually appealing displays.
Creative flair and ability to conceptualize and execute innovative display ideas.
Knowledge of retail and consumer behavior principles.
Proficiency in design software such as Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, and/or other relevant design tools is a plus.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
Ability to work well in a team environment and collaborate effectively with store personnel.
Availability to work 40 hours per week for a six-month internship period.
